/> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> value="그룹명" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="Y" /> </appinfo> /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="15" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="wkTrdBankCd"> <annotation>
